DOC.brief_summary: Experimental Approach : ( 1 ) Participants : Women ( age 21 42 ) seek IVF treatment Center Fertility & Reproductive Surgery eligible study . Seventy woman recruit randomly assign either intervention ( acupuncture plus standard care ) comparison ( standard care alone ) group . ( 2 ) Intervention : Participants intervention group receive 3 acupuncture session project first treatment day 6-8 stimulate IVF cycle , second day embryo transfer third one day post transfer . Participants comparison group receive intervention receive standard care . ( 3 ) Measures : The primary outcome measure include prostacyclin thromboxane vasoactive biomarkers . Secondary outcome measure include perceive stress level . ( 4 ) Procedure : Upon IRB approval , informed consent provide participant . Pre- post- acupuncture urinary metabolite prostacyclin thromboxane assess . A standardized Perceived Stress Scale administer acupuncture session study group , 30-40-minute wait period control group .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Acupuncture Vascular Biomarkers Psychological Well-Being Women Undergoing IVF

The investigator ' overall hypothesis area study , address future research , : ( 1 ) acupuncture augments IVF success enhance perfusion pelvic organs include ovary uterus , ( 2 ) acupuncture reduce level stress optimizes mind-body interaction individual undergo IVF . Specific Aims : 1 . To measure urine prostacyclin thromboxane , acupuncture , 2. ass impact acupuncture psychological well-being woman undergo IVF treatment . SIGNIFICANCE OF THE STUDY Results study shed light mechanism acupuncture improve IVF outcomes . This may lead treatment strategy improve success . Likewise , establish mechanism acupuncture improve IVF may lead great acceptance non-conventional treatment modality general population . Research Design Methods This prospective , randomize , control study . Participants woman Principal Investigator 's practice seek IVF . Participants randomize 1:1 either acupuncture group standard care ( acupuncture ) group . Each group 3 study visit . Rationale Control Group : A sham control group use systematic review suggest sham acupuncture control may unnecessarily complicate RCT evidence base give nature objective outcome IVF study ( http : //www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC3124624/ ) . Power analysis With 35 patient allocate group , assume Student 's T-test use determine difference two independent sample , effect size > 0.6 find statistically significant alpha .05 power .80 . In practical term , since PSS validation sample show mean 13.5 variance=6.2 , average difference great 1.5 raw score point PSS find statistically significant . The investigator plan seek extramural funding future . The investigator use data obtain pilot study perform power analysis calculate number participant need future proposal .
